text: But he sent ambassadors to him, saying, What have I to do with thee, thou king of Judah? <FI>I come<Fi> not against thee this day, but against the house wherewith I have war; and God hath commanded me to make haste: forbear thee from <FI>meddling with<Fi> God, who is with me, that he destroy thee not.
name: II Chronicles 35:21
